scripts.test: playwright install chromium && npm run build && playwright test
scripts.gh-pages: ng build --base-href=/sample-app-angular/ && shx rm -rf pages && shx mkdir pages && cd pages && git init && git remote add pages git@github.com:ui-router/sample-app-angular.git && git fetch pages && git checkout gh-pages && git rm -rf * && shx mv ../dist/browser/* . && git add . && git commit -m 'Update gh-pages' . && git push && cd .. && shx rm -rf pages
